title: To Be An Artist
description:
If you do not know most, or any, of these books and desire to be a creative thinker and creator, you need them. If you have already built your mind to be creative and have a fair amount of skill in reflection of that, you still likely need some of these. 
Beginning artists cannot go wrong with Andrew Loomis, and beginning writers cannot go wrong with Elements of Style and Stephen King - On Writing. 

In short, .mht files are archived webpages. I assume most are familiar with saving webpages in IE and know that when saving a webpage as .html the images and whatnot will be put in a separate folder. If a webpage is saved as an .mht file everything displayed on that webpage will be in that one file. <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MHTML" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MHTML</a>
